latex:
The formula expressing the relationship between $ x$ and $ y$ in the table is:\\
\[ \begin{tabular}{|c|c|c|c|c|c|} \hline x & 2 & 3 & 4 & 5 & 6 \\
\hline y & 0 & 2 & 6 & 12 & 20 \\
\hline \end{tabular}
\]\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\ y = 2x - 4 \qquad\textbf{(B)}\ y = x^2 - 3x + 2 \qquad\textbf{(C)}\ y = x^3 - 3x^2 + 2x$\\
$ \textbf{(D)}\ y = x^2 - 4x \qquad\textbf{(E)}\ y = x^2 - 4$
